result.execSummary:
This case has not been concluded. Unless a judgment of conviction is entered, the defendant is presumed innocent of all charges.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Daron Lamar May Jr

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Daron Lamar May Jr appeared by video.  Attorney Sylvan Jaspen appeared by video for Daron Lamar May Jr.  Prosecuting attorney Elaine B. Fehrs appeared by video for the State of Wisconsin. Deputy Court Clerk: SD. 
Pretrial Conference held.  Defense counsel requests final pretrial and jury trial dates.  Case adjourned, Br. 41.
Final pre-trial scheduled for December 14, 2022 at 01:30 pm.
Jury trial scheduled for February 13, 2023 at 09:00 am.
Justice Point Pretrial Services Report received and filed.

Defendant Daron Lamar May Jr not in court, in custody.  Attorney Sylvan Jaspen in court for Daron Lamar May Jr.  Attorney Elaine B. Fehrs in court for State of Wisconsin. Deputy Court Clerk: SD. 
Scheduling Conference held.  Defense counsel needs offer and discovery and requests adjourned pretrial conference date.  Case adjourned, Br. 41.
Pre-trial conference scheduled for October 18, 2022 at 01:30 pm.

Defendant Daron Lamar May in court with attorney Sylvan Jaspen.  Defendant Daron Lamar May in custody at HOC.  Abby Rockendorf appeared in person for the State of Wisconsin.  Daron Lamar May appeared by video means with Attorney.  
Preliminary hearing proceeded. Court took judicial notice of case #21CF1559. Sworn for the State: MPD Officer S. Kehoss. State rests.  Defense rests.  Defense motion to dismiss argued and denied. Court found probable cause and bound defendant over for trial.  
Original information received and filed;  defendant given a copy, waived reading, was arraigned in open court and plead not guilty.  Case is adjourned to Branch 41.  Scheduling conference scheduled for September 16, 2022 at 08:30 am.

CASE HEARD IN PRELIM FOR BR. 35
Defendant Daron Lamar May in court, appear by video with attorney Sylvan Jaspen, appear by video.  Gregg Herman appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  
Case set for a preliminary hearing. State witness was NOT present. Court ordered case adjourned for CAUSE a Preliminary Hearing in the trial court.   Parties are advised that effective August 1, 2022 this case will be assigned to Judge Audrey Skwierawski, Branch 41 in Room 501 of the Courthouse.  Preliminary hearing scheduled for August 15, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Court ordered no contact with TUW (6/21/1991)
No Contact/No Weapons Order, signed and filed.
Court ordered defendant TURNED OVER TO Justice Point for SUPERVISION Level 5.  No possession of dangerous weapons or firearms.

Defendant Daron Lamar May in court with attorney Fred Richardson.  Defendant Daron Lamar May in custody.  Adam Joseph Best appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Daron Lamar May appeared by video means with Attorney.  Defendant is advised this case is assigned to Judge Rosa, Branch 35.  Defendant given a copy of the complaint and advised of maximum penalties, right to counsel and right to a preliminary hearing.  Court reviewed complaint and found probable cause to hold defendant for further proceedings.  Defense enters a plea of NOT GUILTY as to misdemeanor counts 2 and 3. DEFENDANT IS INDIGENT AND PUBLIC DEFENDER WILL PROVIDE COUNSEL.  Case is adjourned to Br. PE for Br. 35.  
This hearing will be streamed live on Dacast:  https://iframe.dacast.com/live/4dafbf46-ed15-c11c-fa22-a58262833632/99073afd-37c2-acfa-830d-b1ddcaebf0ea  Preliminary hearing scheduled for June 27, 2022 at 08:30 am.

ADDRESS INFO for Daron Lamar May Jr
Current: 2121 North 32nd Street, Milwaukee, WI 53208   (Effective: 06-20-2022)
Prior: 2121 North 34th Street, Milwaukee, WI 53208
Defendant in Custody, Court appearance today in Intake Court, Room 137A.
